title: World Statistics Day 2015 [+] (IDESCAT - Statistical Institute of Catalonia)
text: ( Source : IDESCAT - Statistical Institute of Catalonia ) Today , 20 October 2015 , the international statistics community celebrates World Statistics Day . Official statistics help those with decision-making responsibility to make informed
